name: WP SexyLightBox
author: Mario Aguiar

sections.description: This plugin will add SexyLightBox to all the images in your blog, as long as they’re linking to the image file, it’s not necessary to add “rel=lightbox” anywhere, the plugin does it for you.
sections.installation:
1. Extract the files
  2. Upload the folder /wp-sexylightbox to /wp-content/plugins
  3. Activate the plugin
  4. That’s it! Now you can change colors from SexyLightBox menu in the options tab
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • First Version released.

0.2

  • Galleries (arrows between images) are added.

0.3

  • Added a temp fix to wordpress buit-in gallery.

0.5

  • Updated sexylightbox, now it uses SexyLightBox 2.3.4.
  • Added “use compress script” option.
  • Now you can choose White & Black with images in spanish, or english.
  • Now you can choose where do you want the lightbox to come out, top or bottom.
  • WordPress bult-in gallery is now supported.

0.5.1

  • Fixed several bugs including the wordpress built-in gallery one where it showed rel= in the url

0.5.2

  • Fixed some minors bugs that prevented the plugin from work properly

0.5.3

  • Again, fixed bugs

short_description: Plugin that integrates sexylightbox2 into wordpress.
description: This plugin will add SexyLightBox to all the images in your blog, as long as they’re linking to the image file, it’s not necessary to add “rel=lightbox” anywhere, the plugin does it for you.
